  • View page source

sensortoolkit.reference._ref_api_query.ingest_airnow

ingest_airnow(data, param, time_of_query)[source]

Convert AirNow query data to SDFS formatted datasets.

Parameters

  • data (pandas DataFrame) – Query data received from the AirNow API.

  • param (str) – The name of the SDFS parameter for which data were queried.

  • time_of_query (str) – The time of the API query, expressed as a string with datetime format ‘%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S’.

Returns

SDFS formatted dataset.

Return type

data (pandas DataFrame)
